scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src/ --out-dir lib/ --copy-files && cp -t ./lib/ package.json LICENSE
scripts.patch-publish: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish ./lib --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-publish: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish ./lib --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-publish: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish ./lib --access public && git push --follow-tags
